briefTitle: A 12-week Extension of the Phase III Study (D3820C00004) to Assess the Effect and Safety of NKTR-118 in Patients With Non-cancer-related Pain and Opioid-induced Constipation
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled 12-Week Extension Study to Assess the Safety and Tolerability of NKTR-118 in Patients With Non-Cancer-Related Pain and Opioid-Induced Constipation (OIC)
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the effect and safety of NKTR-118 treatment of opioid-induced constipation in patients with non-cancer-related pain over a 6-month period.

primaryOutcome.measure: Incidence of Patients Experiencing at Least One Adverse Event (AE)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Baseline (Week 0) to end of the follow-up period (Week 14)
